location: Field of battle between the camps.

lines.text: Alarum. Drums and trumpets. Enter AGRIPPA and others

lines.speaker: agrippa
lines.text: Retire, we have engaged ourselves too far: Caesar himself has work, and our oppression Exceeds what we expected.
Alarums. Enter MARK ANTONY and SCARUS wounded

lines.speaker: scarus
lines.text: O my brave emperor, this is fought indeed! Had we done so at first, we had droven them home With clouts about their heads.

lines.speaker: scarus
lines.text: I had a wound here that was like a T, But now 'tis made an H.

lines.speaker: scarus
lines.text: We'll beat 'em into bench-holes: I have yet Room for six scotches more.

lines.speaker: eros
lines.text: They are beaten, sir, and our advantage serves For a fair victory.

lines.speaker: scarus
lines.text: Let us score their backs, And snatch 'em up, as we take hares, behind: 'Tis sport to maul a runner.

lines.speaker: mark antony
lines.text: I will reward thee Once for thy spritely comfort, and ten-fold For thy good valour. Come thee on.
